ComicInfo.Title: Kiss of Death
ComicInfo.Summary: Kiss of Death: Now that Sandra Lords has been cleansed of her dedication to Lucifer by Ramen Alexander Perg, she sets out on a crusade to stop Lucifer from destroying innocent lives.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-06 06:30:43. [CVDB125618] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 20:14:19. [Issue ID 310534]
ComicInfo.Inker: Gary Barnes,Garry Barnes Jr.,James Anderson,Paul Abrams,Gary Barnes
ComicInfo.Letterer: James M. Anderson,James Anderson,James M. Anderson
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Eddie Wagner,Frank Toscano,Greg Weed,James Anderson,Paul Abrams,S. Clarke Hawbaker,Terral Lawrence
ComicInfo.Characters: The Seventh Day [Damian (villain),generic cult members (villains)],Michael Naymen (deceased, as angel),Perg [Ramen Alexander Perg] (antagonist),Despair (villain)
